dmca.title: Alias Systems Objects to Resale of Licensed Software (#3)
dmca.body:
To:	Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints Google
Fax #:(xxx)xxx-xxxx


From:	[Private]
Senior Legal Counsel Alias Systems Corp.

Email: [Private]@alias.com
Telephone	xxx.xxx.xxxx
Fax	xxx.xxx.xxxx

Date:	September 27, 2004
Dear Google User Support, DMCA complaints:

We have recently confirmed that certain Alias software have been advertised for purchase or 
distribution on the following Google Groups sites.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is Maya 6.0.1 Unlimited.

2. The materials infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 are:

Search query: alias maya unlimited v6.0.1
Infringing message:
http://groups.google.com/groups?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-
8&selm=ba40b663.0409171527.Icee3239%40posting.google.com 
Message-ID: ba40b663.0409171527.1cee3239@posting.google.com

Search query: alias maya unlimited
Infringing message: 
http://groups.google.com/groups?q=alias+maya+unlimited&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-
8&selm=2a2cc11e.040908114134604212%40posting.google.com&rnum=1 
Message-ID: 2a2ccIIe.0409081141.34604212@posting,.google.com

...
Page 1 of 2
PAGE	2/2


Search query: alias maya unlimited v6.0.1
Infringing message:
http://groups.google.com/groups?q=alias+maya+unlimited+v6.0.1&hl=en&1r=&i 
e=UTF-
8&selm=2a2cc11e.0409081141.34604212%40posting.google.com&rnum=1 
Message-ID: 2a2cc11e.0409081141.34604212@posting.google.com

3. You may contact me at [Private]@alias.com.

4. The owner/administrator of the Messages identified in item #2 may contact me at 
[Private]@alias.com.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly 
infringed.

[Private]
Senior Legal Counsel Alias Systems Corp.

This transmission is intended only for the Recipient identified above any may contain information that is confidential, solicitor-client privileged utforrnaiion and/or attorney work product. If you are not the intended Recipient of this transmision, please be advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution, replication or other dissemination or use of this communication is strictly prohibited - please notify the sender at the contact number above if you have received this transmission in error and then destroy this transmission and all copies hereof.

[Private]. Toronto. Ontario. Canada M5A 1J7

Page 2 of 2
